snippet.title: Glover | PS5|4, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch
snippet.description: Glover is a puzzle-intensive adventure game made up of 6 worlds with 30 different levels. You control a charismatic glove that walks on two fingers, slaps harder than Steve Austin, dribbles faster than Scottie Pippen, and plays with a bouncy rubber ball.
